00024 /*! \file DateTime.h This file provides data structures for holding a date and time.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <string>
00031 //
00032 
00033 namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities
00034 {
00035 /*! The zulu format. */
00036 #define ZULU_FORMAT_SPECIFIER std::wstring(L"Z")
00037 
00038 /*! The datetime separator format specifier.*/
00039 #define DATETIME_SEPERATOR_FORMAT_SPECIFIER std::wstring(L"T")
00040 
00041 /*! The date format string. */
00042 #define DATEFORMAT std::wstring(L"%Y-%m-%d") // YYYY-MM-DD
00043 
00044 /*! The time format string. */
00045 #define TIMEFORMAT std::wstring(L"%H:%M:%S") // hh:mm:ss
00046 
00047 /*! This class provides storage for a date and time object. */
00048 class DateTime
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         /*! Constructor */
00052         DateTime();
00053 
00054         /*! Destructor */
00055         ~DateTime();
00056 
00057 protected:
00058         /*! The date */
00059         std::wstring affydate;
00060 
00061         /*! The time */
00062         std::wstring affytime;
00063 
00064         /*! indicates if the time falue is UTC */
00065         bool coordinateduniversaltime;
00066 
00067 public:
00068         /*! The date.
00069          *
00070          * @return The date.
00071          */
00072         std::wstring Date() const;
00073         /*! Set the date.
00074          *
00075          * @param value The new date.
00076          */
00077          void Date(std::wstring value);
00078 
00079         /*! The time.
00080          *
00081          * @return The time.
00082          */
00083         std::wstring Time() const;
00084         /*! Set the time.
00085          *
00086          * @param value The new time.
00087          */
00088         void Time(std::wstring value);
00089 
00090         /*! Clears the members. */
00091         void Clear();
00092 
00093         /*! Gets the current date and time.
00094          *
00095          * @return The current date and time.
00096          */
00097         static DateTime GetCurrentDateTime();
00098 
00099         /*! Gets whether or not the DateTime object time value is UTC or not.
00100          *
00101          * @return UTC or not.
00102          */
00103         bool IsUTC();
00104 
00105         /*! Sets if the DateTime is UTC or not.
00106          *      @param value True if the DateTime should be considered UTC.
00107          */
00108         void UTC(bool value) { coordinateduniversaltime = value; }
00109 
00110         /*! Gets the current date and time and concatinates both together.
00111          *
00112          * @return The string representation of the date and time.
00113          */
00114         std::wstring ToString();
00115 
00116         /*! Converts the string into a DateTime.
00117          *      @param value A wstring containing the date and time to convert. The format must match that returned by ToString().
00118          *      @return A DateTime equivalent to the date and time in value.
00119          *      @exception FormatException
00120          */
00121         static DateTime Parse(std::wstring value);
00122 
00123         /*! Get a properly formatted Date string.
00124          *      @param year A four digit year.
00125          *      @param month A one-based month of the year.
00126          *      @param day A one-based day of month
00127          *      @return A properly formatted date string.
00128          */
00129         static std::wstring FormatDate(u_int32_t year, u_int32_t month, u_int32_t day);
00130 
00131         /*! Get a properly formatted Time string.
00132          *      @param hour Zero-based hour of day.
00133          *      @param minute Zero-based minute of hour.
00134          *      @param second Zero-based second of minute.
00135          *      @return A properly formatted time string.
00136          */
00137         static std::wstring FormatTime(u_int32_t hour, u_int32_t minute, u_int32_t second);
00138 
00139         /*! Get a properly formatted date-time string.
00140          *      @param year A four digit year.
00141          *      @param month A one-based month of the year.
00142          *      @param day A one-based day of month
00143          *      @param hour Zero-based hour of day.
00144          *      @param minute Zero-based minute of hour.
00145          *      @param second Zero-based second of minute.
00146          *      @param utc Indicates if the time is Universal Coordinated Time.
00147          *      @return A properly formatted date-time string.
00148          */
00149         static std::wstring FormatDateTime(u_int32_t year, u_int32_t month, u_int32_t day, u_int32_t hour, u_int32_t minute, u_int32_t second, bool utc);
00150 
00151 
00152 protected:
00153         /*! Check the date format and may modify it.
00154          *      @param date The formatted date string.
00155          *      @exception FormatException
00156          */
00157         static void CheckDateFormat(std::wstring& date);
00158 
00159         /*! Check the itme format.
00160          *      @param time The formatted time string.
00161          *      @exception FormatException
00162          */
00163         static void CheckTimeFormat(std::wstring& time);
